name: Shallow-water mudstone
description: Wavy-bedded carbonate with shallow-water bedding features

name: Wavy-bedded to ribbon grainstone
description: Ribbony, mottled grainstone with sinuous mudstone partings

name: Mixed grainstone
description: Intraclast, cross-stratified, and massive grainstones with scoured interlayers and mudstone laminations
interpretation: Storm-reworked tidal flats on inner ramp

name: Trough to HCS grainstone
interpretation: Bedform generation on inner ramp, above storm wave base

name: Mudstone-fill intraclast breccia
description: Rafted angular to tabular intraclast debries in a mudstone matrix
interpretation: Debris flows enhanced by slope of outer ramp

name: Fine clastics
description: Mudstones, siltstones, and fine sandstones, sometimes with graded beds and cross-stratification.
interpretation: Deepwater deposition by settling and turbidity currents

name: Shallow fine clastics
description: Siltstone to fine sandstone with shallow-water bedding features

name: Coarse sandstone
interpretation: Upper shoreface sand, proximal sedimentary fans, or fluvial deposits

name: Intraclast grainstone
description: Medium to thick-bedded, likely oolitic, grainstone with mudstone rip-up chips
interpretation: Reworking of debris on a shallow, sandy platform margin

name: Wavy-laminated mudstone
interpretation: Quiescent platform interior, sometimes with current ripples or stromatolites

name: Knobbly stromatolites
description: Branching, columnar stromatolites with mudstone fill
